Directives > ui-tile-container

ui-tile-container


<div ui-tile-container drag=".avatar-tile" drag-ghost="avatar-tile-ghost" class="tile-container-avatar">
    <ui-avatar ng-repeat="user in users" avatar-name="{{user.name}}" class="avatar-tile"></ui-avatar>
</div>

ui-tile-container Options

Name type default description
drag string '' Enable the drag and re-sort of the tile in the tile container. That value is the class name of the tile element.
drag-ghost string '' The name of the class to apply to the tile when dragging it.
drag-on-sort string '' Custom function name to be used when the tile-container order has been changed
